details.description: Help with importing and exporting - customs, documents, paperwork, insurance, logistics
details.body:
You can use a freight forwarder to help you import and export goods for your business.

Some freight forwarders are members of trade organisations, eg the British International Freight Association (BIFA) and the European Freight Forwarders Association.

Help you can get

A freight forwarder can help you with:

  • packaging and labelling
  • customs paperwork
  • working out what taxes or duties need to be paid
  • insurance
  • managing your inventory

Some freight forwarders specialise in certain goods, eg live animals, food, military goods, or dangerous and hazardous materials.
